verses.verse: צדיק <WH6662> Righteous אתה <WH859> thou, יהוה <WH3068> O LORD, כי <WH3588> when אריב <WH7378> I plead אליך <WH413> with אך <WH389> thee: yet משׁפטים <WH4941> thee of judgments: אדבר <WH1696> let me talk אותך <WH854> with מדוע <WH4069> Wherefore דרך <WH1870> doth the way רשׁעים <WH7563> of the wicked צלחה <WH6743> prosper? שׁלו <WH7951> they happy כל <WH3605> are all בגדי <WH899> that deal very treacherously? בגד׃ <WH898> that deal very treacherously?
